blogPost.excerpt: Statusly is a Slack bot that helps you automate your Slack status and DND/away settings with Powerful Routines. Sync your Google Calendar and Zoom Meetings with your custom routines. For more information visit https://statusly.app/.
blogPost.body: Statusly is a Slack bot that helps you automate your Slack status and DND/away settings with Powerful Routines. Sync your Google Calendar and Zoom Meetings with your custom routines. For more information visit https://statusly.app/.
blogPost.title: Statusly - Automate Slack status, DND based on your daily routines 🤖
blogPost.author: Sanjith Kanagavel

localize.description: Statusly是一款松弛机器人，它通过功能强大的例程帮助您自动执行松弛状态和免打扰/离开设置。将您的Google日历和缩放会议与您的自定义例程同步。欲了解更多信息，请访问https://statusly.app/.。
localize.tagline: 根据您的日常工作🤖自动执行闲置状态和免打扰

localize.description: Statusly是一款鬆弛機器人，它通過功能強大的例程幫助您自動執行鬆弛狀態和免打擾/離開設置。將您的Google日曆和縮放會議與您的自定義例程同步。欲瞭解更多信息，請訪問https://statusly.app/.。
localize.tagline: 根據您的日常工作🤖自動執行閒置狀態和免打擾

previous.excerpt: Most scheduling tools put the burden on the recipient. SavvyCal makes it easy for both parties to find the best time to meet—in an instant.
previous.title: SavvyCal - Sending your scheduling link shouldn't feel weird.

localize.description: 大多数日程安排工具都将负担放在收件人身上。SavvyCal让双方很容易找到最佳会面时间-在瞬间。
localize.tagline: 发送您的日程安排链接应该不会觉得奇怪。

localize.description: 大多數日程安排工具都將負擔放在收件人身上。SavvyCal讓雙方很容易找到最佳會面時間-在瞬間。
localize.tagline: 發送您的日程安排鏈接應該不會覺得奇怪。

next.excerpt: Unstack's content platform now allows you to set up one-time and subscription payments as well as launch membership sites with granular page-level access controls for users. Turn your digital content into a money-making machine using Unstack and Stripe.
next.title: Unstack Payments - eCommerce landing pages and membership sites

localize.description: Unstack的内容平台现在允许你设置一次性和订阅支付，以及推出会员网站，为用户提供细粒度的页面级访问控制。将您的数字内容变成一台赚钱的机器，使用Unstack and Strike(解栈和条带)。
localize.tagline: 电子商务登录页面和会员网站

localize.description: Unstack的內容平臺現在允許你設置一次性和訂閱支付，以及推出會員網站，爲用戶提供細粒度的頁面級訪問控制。將您的數字內容變成一臺賺錢的機器，使用Unstack and Strike(解棧和條帶)。
localize.tagline: 電子商務登錄頁面和會員網站
